_description: John Audelay, ‘In die sancti stephani’, — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘In reuerens of oure lord in heuen / Worchip this marter swete sent steuen’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Saynt steuen þe first martereHe ched his blod in herþ
                    here…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…When our soule schal wynd awayHe grawntus al
                    remyssion
BodDou302.Editions:
Chambers,  Edmund Kerchever,  and  Frank Sidgwick.

         5 (1910): 473-91: 483-4.
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS

Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 62-3; 1977, 52.
